attributes.action: give people the right to vote regardless of their age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am 14. I have very strong political views (as strong, if not stronger than those of most adults) and have a good understanding of our political system. In the past several hundred years, the government began by giving men the right to vote, then women and now children are amongst the only people denied this right. 
I understand that some young people do not appreciate politics, but that is the same with any age group and these people will not vote.
